alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:01PM MDT until July 05 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LAKE...MINNEHAHA...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...SOUTHEASTERN DOUGLAS...MCCOOK...HANSON...TURNER AND HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 258 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Canova to near Canistota to near Menno, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 257 pm CDT, quarter size hail was reported . IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Lake Vermillion State Recreation Area, Marion and Monroe around 305 PM CDT. Parker and Humboldt around 310 PM CDT. Hartford, Wall Lake and Montrose around 315 PM CDT. Chancellor around 320 PM CDT. Tea, Lennox, Colton and Ellis around 325 PM CDT. Worthing, Viborg, Hurley and Lyons around 330 PM CDT. Sioux Falls, Brandon, Harrisburg, Crooks, Davis and Dell Rapids around 335 PM CDT. Baltic, Lake Alvin State Recreation Area and Renner around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Olivet. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
